qas.question: When were Castille and Aragon united?
After 1479, what language became more valued?
When did Catalan literature begin a downward trend?
What language began to supersede Catalan?
At this time what classes became bilingual?

context: With the union of the crowns of Castille and Aragon (<a0_0>1479<a0_0/>), the use of <a1_0><a3_0>Spanish<a3_0/><a1_0/> gradually became more prestigious. Starting in the <a2_0>16th century<a2_0/>, Catalan literature experienced a decline, the language came under the influence of Spanish, and the <a4_0>urban and literary<a4_0/> classes became bilingual.
